attributes.title: no🧡
attributes.review:
so i was curious about 🍊Trump’s🍊 campaign and downloaded the app. all of a sudden when i launch the app all of those 🤢Jeffery Epstein🤢 and.  🍊Donald Trump🍊 court files popped up on my phone! then my phone connected to my speaker via bluetooth and i heard 🍊Trump🍊 say “CHINA CHINA CHINA CHINA” over and over 🤨🍊🙄
It scared me! 
No matter what I did it wouldn’t stop 😡
So i threw my phone on the floor and set it on fire and beat it with a bat🤭✨
Then all of a sudden the speaker started screaming “when the looting starts the shooting starts!” 👁👄👁 I was terrified!
To think that people are actually downloading this app! With all these bugs? I couldn’t understand 🙂✌🏼

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!
attributes.review: I was on this app because I support Donald Trump, the best president in the world, but it made my phone start glitching. The app claimed it was because my case wasn’t white. I don’t have proof, but I’m pretty sure it gave my toaster a virus that made it come to life and kill my cat because I adopted it in Mexico. I won’t be redownloading until the developers fix these issues.

attributes.title: You already know where this is going.
attributes.review:
App horrible making calls crash and messing up my phone downloading it was a waste of time if you do just look for yourself and see what happens but one star sorry. 

Also just downloaded it to give it a one star i dislike trump very much and i am apart a gen z lets get it 😁

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Wouldve given it one star if possible😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡This app can try to take away LGBTQ+ adoption rights, shut down popular Gen Z majority apps, knows how to over share on twitter, and make everyone in this country poor😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱Can’t even run a country right or shut down an app that steals and sells our information but tries to shut down one that made it mad😤😤😤😤😤😤😤😤HORRIBLE DONT RECOMMEND🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible App
attributes.review: I wanted to support that fake tan on the TV and I thought this app was the perfect thing to use!! But when I opened it and gave it all the information it needed, it turns out I had signed my soul away to the devil! That’s right, this app is a way to sell your soul to the Devil himself!!! One star, and now I have to call in Sam and Dean Winchester to help me get my soul back!!

attributes.title: no💞
attributes.review: This app is completely ridiculous. It took seventeen days exactly to download and when it did finally download i opened it and showed a picture of our amazing cheeto president we have, to my pet fish it died. So i give this app a 1/5 stars and i do ask for this app to be deleted for the respect of my fish, his friends, and family. Thank you😔

attributes.title: Great President
attributes.review: All the negative comments are from snowflakes that can’t handle difference of opinions. Trump has done a great job for America, and with God’s help will win again in 2020. 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: This app annoys me to no end. My phone always sends hundreds of notifications overnight, and I have been receiving too many spam calls. Also, Facebook posted that this gives your phone a virus that leaks all of your passwords to the PTA group chat, and all of the messages you have ever sent to anyone! Terrible ✨

attributes.title: Rat problem
attributes.review: I downloaded the app  for my gourgeous orange and the app kept crashing everytime I clicked on it and then my phone started glitching and I got hacked it was so awful. I also opened it after turning off my phone and a rat teleported to my house and it started fighting my but luckily I’m a Kyoshi warrior so I was safe and sound I really don’t recommend this app👎😾

attributes.title: This app killed my disabled cousin
attributes.review: i downloaded this app then the government showed up to my front door and made my disabled cousin run 10 miles even tho she has no legs then they made her lift 100 lbs weights even tho she has no arms then she dropped dead and the government said good that's what she deserved bc she's also an immigrant from Europe then they said trump ordered them to do it
